REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0941 reute r f BC-VANZETTI-<VANZ>-INCRE 03-11 0053

TEXT.TITLE: VANZETTI <VANZ> INCREASE OF SHARES APPROVED
TEXT.BODY: vanzetti Systems INc said its shareholders approved increasing the number of authorized shares to five mln from three mln. Shareholders also approved increasing the number of shares reserved for options to employees to 300,000 from 150,000 Reuter
